sentences.en: After tubal dredge how long be pregnant for optimal period?
sentences.cn: 输卵管疏通后多久怀孕为最佳时期?

sentences.en: Avoid to head for air dredge not free, population is concentrated public.
sentences.cn: 避免前往空气疏通不畅 、 人口密集的公共场所.

sentences.en: Hammer dredge is a technical improvement of the existing dredge sampler.
sentences.cn: 摘要重锤式拖网取样器是对现行常规拖网的技术改进.

sentences.en: He likes to dredge up unpleasant little facts about the film stars.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢收集(或回想)有关电影明星的不愉快的小事.

sentences.en: He managed to dredge up a smile.
I have a private life too, and I suppose they could dredge up something.
sentences.cn: 我本人也有私生活上的问题, 我想他们也会捞到一点稻草.

sentences.en: I wouldn't want to dredge up the past.
In the background you may see one more dredge.
sentences.cn: 在背景里，你可以看到另外一辆挖泥机。

sentences.en: On these basis, the technical requirements for clutch of dredge are established.
sentences.cn: 根据泥泵传动系统性能分析结果, 提出了对离合器的技术要求.

sentences.en: Ritter also explained how to dredge information from local newspaper.
sentences.cn: 里特尔还讲了如何从地方报纸上挖掘情报.

sentences.en: The dredge sat in the boat basin.
sentences.cn: 挖泥船仍然停泊在小湾中.

sentences.en: They have to dredge the canal so that ships can use it.
sentences.cn: 他们须疏浚运河河道轮船方可通航.

sentences.en: We can introduce the special machines for dredge work.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍一种专用的管道疏通设备.

sentences.en: We should have the dredge, barges and draglines in place about the same time.
sentences.cn: 差不多要在同时使挖泥机, 驳船和索斗铲各就各位.

sentences.en: Why try to dredge up such unpleasant little things?
sentences.cn: 为什么要故意找出这些令人不快的小事来 呢 ?

sentences.en: Why try to dredge up the sad facts of the past?
sentences.cn: 过去的伤心事何必重提 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 挖泥船；疏浚机；挖泥机；撒粉器
（用挖泥船等）[水运]疏浚；（用拖捞网等）捞取；（在食物上）撒（面粉等）

phrases.tran_cn: 吸泥泵；挖泥泵；排泥泵；泥浆泵

trans.tran_cn: 挖泥机, 挖泥船, 捞网
trans.tran_en: a machine, in the form of a bucket ladder, grab, or suction device, used to remove material from a riverbed, channel, etc

trans.tran_cn: 挖掘； 疏浚； 挖出， 吸出； 重提旧事
trans.tran_en: to remove mud or sand from the bottom of a river,  harbour  etc, or to search for something by doing this

trans.tran_cn: 清淤，疏浚（河道等），挖掘（泥土等），使显露，捞取，（用面粉、糖等）撒
